gama ahuwama mama kiwwe agalawaththa kiyalayi.ape game nama kiwwoth koheda kiyala hithaganna bari nisayi ehema kiwwe.kohoma hari hatha hamara ata wenakota thihak withara panthiyata aawa.okkoma matawadiya lokuyi.mama wage kota kalisam adapu lamayithun hathara denek hitiya.me hamoma math ekka katha kara.ganu lamayi dahayak withara hitiya.mehamoma math ekka katha karana kota nikamma mage baya nathuwa giya.dawal wiweka welawen passe bel eka gahuwama sudu diga kalisama adapu sar kenek panthiyata aawa.
